meanings.definition: A person who attempts or tries something.
meanings.sent1: The young essayers were eager to test their new invention.
meanings.sent2: The essayers in the science lab were conducting experiments.
meanings.sent3: The group of essayers decided to try baking a cake without a recipe.
meanings.sent4: She was a fearless essayer, always taking on new challenges.
meanings.sent5: The essayers bravely ventured into the unknown forest to explore.

meanings.definition: The act of attempting or trying something.
meanings.sent1: The essayers of the new dance routine practiced diligently.
meanings.sent2: His essayers in solving the puzzle paid off when he finally cracked it.
meanings.sent3: The essayers of the new recipe ended up with a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her essayers in learning a new language were met with success.
meanings.sent5: The essayers of the daring escape plan carefully mapped out every detail.
